thread.title: Kadlec boosts awareness about breast cancer
thread.title_full: Kadlec boosts awareness about breast cancer

author: Tri-City Herald
title: Kadlec boosts awareness about breast cancer
text: October 1, 2015 Kadlec boosts awareness about breast cancer Breast cancer survivor Tammy Walker claps and smiles Thursday after giving the voice command over a two-way radio for a cancer ribbon flag, sewn by volunteer Jan Jacobs, to be hoisted into place at Kadlec Regional Medical Center in Richland. Walker is an employee at Kadlec Clinic in Kennewick. Bob Brawdy Tri-City Herald Kadlec Regional Medical Center employees Dave Lily, left, and David Mazza hoist a Breast Cancer Awareness flag, sewn by Kadlec volunteer Jan Jacobs, into place Thursday above the Richland hospital campus. Itâ€™s the 12th consecutive year for the flag to fly at the facility during the month of October to raise awareness about breast cancer and its treatment. Watch a video at www. tricityherald.com/video Bob Brawdy Tri-City Herald Breast cancer survivor Tammy Walker joins a toast, with sparkling cider, to celebrate cancer survivors and honor cancer victims Thursday during a flag-raising ceremony at Kadlec Regional Medical Center. Bob Brawdy Tri-City Herald 1 of 3
